channel.title: VERY weird unexplainable mystery
channel.description:
Look at this video and you will see what i mean:
http://video.google.com/videoplay?docid=-4746107793579052099&q=weird+car+ghost&hl=en
How do you think thats possible!

item.title: VERY weird unexplainable mystery

item.description:

why would about 300 people make up stories saying its not real?

item.title: VERY weird unexplainable mystery
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

[quote=“Martin, post:10, topic:17918”][quote author=XxKanexX link=topic=26837.msg309602#msg309602 date=1160693104]

kane its spelt ouija anyway on subject etchnology isnt perfect these days anything could have happened but if earlier on the cop cra rammed the guy that wouldnt make sense but it didnt so umm :-S

Thanks for the correction.

I’ve learnt some things about them from my History teacher. And from past read experiances i’ve read that they do actually work. Some people who have tried them claim they havn’t, but only certain ones do work.

The yes/no must be written in either silver or gold, the wood from which it’s made from must come from a tree that is over 20 years, the glass must be something valuable and fragile.

That’s what i’ve heard anyway. Don’t particularily want to try one to find out if they do work, though. lol.
[/quote]

I dont really care whether you believe me, but i have tried and it does work.[/quote]
Maybe your face scared away the spirits?

Read full topic

item.title: VERY weird unexplainable mystery
item.dc:creator: @Martin Martin
item.description:
@Martin wrote:

[quote=“XxKanexX, post:9, topic:17918”][quote author=typenamehere link=topic=26837.msg309548#msg309548 date=1160691015]
kane its spelt ouija anyway on subject etchnology isnt perfect these days anything could have happened but if earlier on the cop cra rammed the guy that wouldnt make sense but it didnt so umm :-S
[/quote]
Thanks for the correction.

I’ve learnt some things about them from my History teacher. And from past read experiances i’ve read that they do actually work. Some people who have tried them claim they havn’t, but only certain ones do work.

The yes/no must be written in either silver or gold, the wood from which it’s made from must come from a tree that is over 20 years, the glass must be something valuable and fragile.

That’s what i’ve heard anyway. Don’t particularily want to try one to find out if they do work, though. lol.[/quote]

I dont really care whether you believe me, but i have tried and it does work.

The yes/no must be written in either silver or gold, the wood from which it’s made from must come from a tree that is over 20 years, the glass must be something valuable and fragile.
